did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of Mary Hallock Foote n.d.
did.physdesc: This collection consists of a 2-page letter, ALS.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Mary Hallock Foote, Accession #8243 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from Walter R. Benjamin on April 5, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In an undated letter to Florence E. Bates, Foote says she is not distressed because her story was returned and asks if Bates has read "The Foe of Compromise" in the April Atlantic.
